Body:
"""Test plotting function with one given host.
    """
with tmpdir.as_cwd():
    output = (
        """Plotting GPU and CPU data.
Data for the following hosts will be plotted: {}
Plotting all modules in your input data.
Your file was saved as 'testpng.png' in the working directory.
"""
        .format(host))
    result = cli_runner.invoke(cli, ['plot', '--csv={}'.format(data[
        'test.csv']), '--host={}'.format(host), '--output-name=testpng',
        '--output-format=png'])
    assert result.exit_code == 0
    assert result.output == output
    assert os.path.exists('testpng.png')
pytest.mark.parametrize('host', ('draco', 'hydra'))
